HARIET BEDROOM SET

HARIET BEDROOM SET

AED37,935

Clear
Add to Wishlist
Add to Wishlist

DELIVERY BY 15TH DECEMBER

The beautifully kept secret of eternal youth. It is, in part, about the deep restfulness that great design brings with its soothing aesthetics. And it lies in the material that makes this precision-pleated headboard so special. Smart fabric. Looks and feels like suede, attracts admiration but repels everything else.

 

DIMENSIONS

Bed 358cm x 223cm x 150cm.

NT 60cm x 46cm x 50cm.

DRS 150cm x 61cm x 76cm.

MIR 120cm x 120cm x 6cm.

Materials and finish

Hard Chinese Pine and Plywood.
304 Stainless Steel with Antique Brass.
Antonio Porcelain Smart.

Fully upholstered in fabric.

SKU: N/A Categories: BEDROOM, BEDROOM SET/BEDS, LUXURY Tag: fb
